text: What percentage of software developers write custom/bespoke software?
What percentage of software developers are involved in the creation of custom/bespoke software?
This should include both employees of companies with in-house development shops and freelance web developers, consultants, etc.
(Basically everything excluding the folks who write the "shrink-wrapped" stuff.
NOTE: This is for research purposes, so I'm looking for something approximating an accurate statistic.
(In other words, my intention isn't to poll the stackoverflow user base.
